text: Va agar tarsided, ki adl natavoned kard dar ʙorai jatimduxtarone, ki zeri sarparastii sumo qaror dorand, pas ʙo zanoni digare, ki dust dored, izdivoc kuned ʙo du jo se jo cor. Pas agar tarsided, ki nametavoned adlro ʙa coj ovared, pas ʙojad ʙa jak zan kifojat kuned va jo ʙo kanizakonaton izdivoc kuned, in nazdiktarast, ki sitam nakuned
